Village.Body: You seem to have awakened in a small stone house in a village in Egypt. You glance and observe your surroundings.

Shovel.Body: You pick up the shovel and feel a sense of nostalgia.

House.Body: You look around and see a shiny bracelet on top of a note on the table and a couple of items laying around the room. The note reads -> Meet me in the main city, i'll find you... we are going to hit it big - Big Brother

Outside.Body: You are outside your village house and see a couple of villagers walking around. You see a couple of people talking about the ominous signs and strange occurrences happening around the village. On another Note, you see a the goodest boy in the world, a dog.

Dog.Body: You pet the dog and it wags its tail. You feel a sense of happiness and joy. You feel a rush of memories of your own dog as a child when the family was still together. You feel a sense of nostalgia and happiness. You remember the old tales your father to tell you about the secret water tunnels along the nile river.

Choices.Text: Lets Head to the Main City!

People.Body: You talk to the villages and they tell you about the weird weather patterns and strange smell coming from the river.

Choices.Text: Lets Head to the Main City!

Gate.Body: You near the entrance to the main city and see a couple of guards standing at the entrance. They seem to taking entrance fees from the people entering the city. You see a couple of people entering the city and a couple of people leaving the city. I didn't bring any money with me. What should I do?

MainCity.Body: You manage to sneak through the sewer

CityStreet.Body: You walk around the city and see a couple of people walking around. There seems to be chatter about a man named Moses who went to visit the king.... There seems to be a lot of commotion near the River. What happened?

River.Body: You walk to the river and see a couple of people talking about the strange smell coming from the river. What a scene the entire river is red and the fish are dead! There is no more clean water to drink. You hear the king's messenger exclaim, -> ANyone who can find a new water source will be greatly rewarded! Maybe we'll find something useful from a previous location?

Water!.Body: You remember the old stories your family use to tell about the secret water tunnels and start digging around. You find a secret water tunnel and water starts to overflow. Everyone around you starts cheering!

Beyond.Body: I hope nothing bad happened to my brother. I should go look for him.
